attributes.action: Make the british public aware of the security threat posed by Internet Explorer
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Following a recent cyber attack in China, the governments of Germany and France have issued advised their citizens to use an alternative "Microsoft Internet Explorer" to browse the internet.

So far UK government has not issued such advice, we urge them to do so.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
